definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
racing bicycle (abbr. for 公路自行車|公路自行车[gong1 lu4 zi4 xing2 che1])
Karakorum Highway, linking Pakistan and Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Gong1 lu4

definition: Suhua Highway, coastal road in northern Taiwan, built on the side of cliffs above the Pacific Ocean

sentences.english: A truck rear-end our van on the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 在告诉公路上一辆卡车从后面撞上我们的休旅车。

sentences.english: There are many roads in Mao Ming.
The truck came coughing up the road.
sentences.chinese: 卡车沿著公路噗哧噗哧地开过来。

sentences.english: His main complaint was that, at just three lanes, the M25 was not big or bold enough.
sentences.chinese: 他那时还抱怨说M25公路只有三车道，不够宽。

sentences.english: The highway bisects the road at this point.
sentences.chinese: 公路在此点与此路交叉。

sentences.english: Planting trees suitable to sites is the key factor of success in highway greening.
sentences.chinese: 适地适树是高速公路绿化成功的关键因素。

sentences.english: This newly-built road twisted and turned across the hills.
sentences.chinese: 这条新建成的公路蜿蜓曲折地穿过群山。

sentences.english: Bridgehead bump is one of the urgent problems in the process of highway construction.
sentences.chinese: 桥头跳车是目前公路建设中急需解决的问题之一。

sentences.english: US Highway 2 from Ray to Minot.
Maybe the elevated highway was a bad idea.
sentences.chinese: 可能高架公路是个坏的主意。

sentences.english: The car sped along the road towards the village.
sentences.chinese: 汽车沿公路朝那村子疾驶而去。

sentences.english: There is also a related issue involving highway overpasses.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个问题是与高速公路立交桥相关的。

sentences.english: Shenyang is connected by several major expressways.
sentences.chinese: 沉阳是由几个主要的高速公路连接。

sentences.english: They don't want people to see shacks on the road in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 他们不想让外人们看到南非公路边的窝棚。

sentences.english: It is very dangerous to cut in while driving on the highroad.
sentences.chinese: 在高速公路上抢道，是非常危险的行为。

sentences.english: There was a three-car collision on the motorway.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路上发生了一起三车相撞的事故。

definition: highway/expressway/same as 高速公路[gao1 su4 gong1 lu4]
Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
